body:
After the extended leave I took from my leave as Moderator, I'm back.

Sorry about the lack of plug.dj events, though I'm not sure if people actually missed them... I am hoping to re-activate them sometime soon but it's all dependant on the availability of the members, etc...

Anyways, ask me anything... I'll answer most questions.
body_tagged:

title: AMA/Plug.DJ

replies.body:
you missed a god "Omega Update" PlugDJ I started unless you were there 

25 players max 

started with 3 players
We all spammed skypes
the new forums came up so I posted a thread  
it was amazing
We were allowed to play whatever we wanted and we had a challenge on who had The most "woots" on a funny video. I won with Toy Story 69 getting 18 woots

Welcome back to the staff team 
Favorite Color?
